last_episode_to_air.name: The Gods of Guilt
last_episode_to_air.overview: In a shocking twist, the missing pieces of Gloria's murder come together on the witness stand â€” but one last surprise leaves the entire courtroom shaken.

name: The Lincoln Lawyer
overview: Sidelined after an accident, hotshot Los Angeles lawyer Mickey Haller restarts his career - and his trademark Lincoln - when he takes on a murder case.

seasons.name: Season 2
seasons.overview: With his firm in great demand and the team busier than ever, Mickey meets a possible new love interest and takes on another high-profile case.

episodes.name: He Rides Again
episodes.overview: Following a personal and professional spiral, Los Angeles defense lawyer Mickey Haller receives an unexpected opportunity from a fellow attorney.

episodes.name: The Magic Bullet
episodes.overview: A high-profile murder trial sends Mickey scrambling to find evidence for his defense, while Maggie offers him a chance to help rebuild her trust.

episodes.name: Momentum
episodes.overview: Mickey looks for a link between the Trevor Elliott case and his mysterious new client, Lorna chases down a lead, and Cisco voices security concerns.

episodes.name: Chaos Theory
episodes.overview: After a close call at his office, Mickey hashes things out with Detective Griggs. A witness in Maggie's human trafficking case has second thoughts.

episodes.name: Twelve Lemmings in a Box
episodes.overview: Trevor's demands during jury selection frustrate Mickey, who reaches out for some unorthodox help. Cisco uncovers another person with a motive.

episodes.name: Bent
episodes.overview: As Mickey attempts to track down the source of a possible bribe, he meets with Lara's former colleague, revisits an old case and does a favor for Maggie.

episodes.name: Lemming Number Seven
episodes.overview: On the first day of Trevor's trial, Mickey tries to prove the police had tunnel vision. Maggie's new witness provides a lead. Lorna steps in with Hayley.

episodes.name: The Magic Bullet Redux
episodes.overview: After a damaging day of testimony, Mickey searches for the one piece of evidence that will crack his case wide open. Maggie faces a deadline on Soto.

episodes.name: The Uncanny Valley
episodes.overview: Determined to clear his name, Trevor pushes to take the stand, but the risky strategy leaves Mickey with more questions than answers.

episodes.name: The Brass Verdict
episodes.overview: Mickey confronts Trevor as the pieces fall into place, and his chance to right a past wrong could have dire consequences for Maggie.

episodes.name: The Rules of Professional Conduct
episodes.overview: Mickey meets a new client, receives a frustrating request and makes an instant connection with a chef. Lorna has her hands full juggling work and school.

episodes.name: Obligations
episodes.overview: Stuck in a sticky ethical dilemma, Mickey seeks advice from Legal Siegel and comes up with a strategy to help get a vulnerable client out of a scrape.

episodes.name: Conflicts
episodes.overview: Mickey has to think on his feet when he takes on a high-profile murder case against a razor-sharp prosecutor. Lorna can't shake her doubts about Cisco.

episodes.name: Discovery
episodes.overview: As his team hunts for a needle in a haystack to clear Lisa's name, Mickey comes up with a creative solution for a teenager accused of vandalism.

episodes.name: Suspicious Minds
episodes.overview: Cisco lays himself on the line for a friend. After pushing Andrea to show her cards in the courtroom, Mickey risks overplaying his hand.

episodes.name: Withdrawal
episodes.overview: While Mickey recovers from a brutal encounter, Izzy wrestles with regrets. Lorna devises an artful way to serve a subpoena. Maggie makes a huge decision.

episodes.name: Cui Bono
episodes.overview: As Lisa's trial begins, a mysterious letter left on Mickey's doorstep sends Cisco racing to verify a potentially game-changing piece of information.

episodes.name: Covenants and Stipulations
episodes.overview: Mickey reevaluates his trial strategy after Andrea unveils a key piece of evidence and an unexpected final witness. Haley plans a birthday surprise.

episodes.name: The Fifth Witness
episodes.overview: After an unexpected witness gives emotional testimony on the stand, Mickey and Lorna hatch a clever plan to cast doubt on the prosecution's case.

episodes.name: Bury Your Past
episodes.overview: The defense rests, and a verdict is in â€” but Mickey still has more to learn about Lisa. Lorna and Cisco's wedding plans hit another hiccup.

2.name: Season 2
2.overview: With his firm in great demand and the team busier than ever, Mickey meets a possible new love interest and takes on another high-profile case.

episodes.name: La Culebra
episodes.overview: Mickey deliberates over representing the person accused of killing Gloria Dayton. Hayley asks her dad for help when her old babysitter is arrested.

episodes.name: Special Circumstances
episodes.overview: With everyone rattled by his dangerous new case, Mickey faces a major blow when an armed robbery trial turns violent. Julian's bail hearing hits a snag.

episodes.name: Strange Bedfellows
episodes.overview: While Lorna takes the bar exam, Mickey deals with a long-shot motion, a surprise subpoena and a skittish source. Andrea contends with a sensitive case.

episodes.name: Rearview Blind Spots
episodes.overview: Struggling with guilt as he tries to connect the dots in Gloria's murder, Mickey seeks advice from an old friend. Andrea receives devastating news.

episodes.name: What Happens in Victorville
episodes.overview: As Mickey sets a daring plan in motion involving a cartel boss, Lorna urges him to reach out to a besieged Andrea. Cisco tracks a witness in Las Vegas.

episodes.name: Man on Fire
episodes.overview: Mickey's team sets a trap as Julian's trial begins. Hayley blames her dad for a tragic loss, and Lorna receives her bar exam results.

episodes.name: Relevance
episodes.overview: A brutal day in court throws Mickey off his game. Lorna's new case sends her racing through the courthouse. Andrea confides in the wrong person.

episodes.name: Mystery Man
episodes.overview: When the judge rules a pivotal witness can testify, Mickey hatches a desperate plan to get a video admitted into evidence. Izzy gets a huge opportunity.

episodes.name: Ghosts
episodes.overview: With his client's fate uncertain and the DA demanding a mistrial, Mickey goes out on a legal limb to help sway the judge into letting the case continue.

episodes.name: The Gods of Guilt
episodes.overview: In a shocking twist, the missing pieces of Gloria's murder come together on the witness stand â€” but one last surprise leaves the entire courtroom shaken.
